api_list.name: Available Locations  (Beta)
api_list.description: Get the list of available locations
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter154.p.rapidapi.com/trends/available"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter154.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Continuation User's Media
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the list of a user's medias
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter154.p.rapidapi.com/user/medias/continuation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter154.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
